title: Kennen Ult and passive not showing up on screen
body: So i was playing a normal game as Lux with the Star Guardian Lux skin, and was laning against a Kennen with the Swamp Master Kennen skin. When we both hit 6 he went all in, and killed me, but I could not see his passive mark around my character, and his ults animation was not on screen, i could hear the visual ques for it, but it didnt apear on screen. This happened twice.

replies.body:
Hey Ajani goldenmane -

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
Hey Katey! just wondering can you clarify if this known issue is with isolated with Swamp Master Kennen or are you aware of it happening with other Kennen skins?
Hi! We have seen issues of it occurring on other skins.
Thanks :) is there a chance of Kennen being disabled?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lAFxWGvM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-03T17:19:58.631+0000)
>
> Hey Ajani goldenmane -
> 
> Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.

hi KateyKhaos can you please relay the message that the chat servers aren't working for people in South Texas, West Texas, and parts of Louisiana
Yup! Done and done! Not sure if it's ISP related or not, but I've passed the message on to the team who looks into this type of thing. ^-^
